itunes:title: Episode 761 - Special Guest 'The MeatEater' Steven Rinella
title: Episode 761 - Special Guest 'The MeatEater' Steven Rinella
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Steven Rinella of ‘The MeatEater Podcast’ to talk sustainable hunting, what it’s like to be mauled by a Grizzly Bear, if Bear Grylls is a legit outdoorsman or full of sh*t, everyone moving to Montana, and why...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Steven Rinella of ‘The MeatEater Podcast’ to talk sustainable hunting, what it’s like to be mauled by a Grizzly Bear, if Bear Grylls is a legit outdoorsman or full of sh*t, everyone moving to Montana, and why people get offended by his podcasts, books, and Netflix show.
